member.name: T:Serenity.AIHub.Client.ISerenityAIHubClient

member.name: M:Serenity.AIHub.Client.ISerenityAIHubClient.CreateConversation(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a conversation with the specified agent code and version.
member.param: The agent code to use for the conversation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the created conversation response.
